description: Leon`s Charizard battled against Lance`s Gyarados (Red Gyarados) in the finals of the Pokémon World Championships, the tournament that determines the world`s best at Pokémon battling. In the one-on-one final, the two Daimaxed but Leon`s Charizard came out victorious. Leon was then crowned world champion.
name: Lizardon (Dande)
